name: Pseudodragon Familiar
movement: walking speed of 15 feet and flying speed of 60 feet
description: The Pseudodragon is a small, dragon-like creature associated with magic, known for its vibrant scales and delicate wings.
memorable: Its ability to communicate telepathically and resist magic makes it a valuable ally to spellcasters.
goals: Often serves as a magical familiar, assisting its master with reconnaissance and enhancing spellcasting.
relations: Typically found accompanying spellcasters or other magical beings.
environment: Commonly found in mystical settings or areas where magic is prevalent.
strengths: Notable for agility in flight and resistance to magic, along with stealth skills.
weaknesses: Low hit points and physical strength make it vulnerable in direct combat.
attacks: Makes a melee attack with its Sting, causing piercing damage and potentially poisoning the target.
most_powerful_ability: Telepathic Static: can stun enemies with overwhelming telepathic imagery.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet and exceptional passive Perception of 16.
skills: Excels in Stealth with a +4 modifier, allowing it to remain hidden.
additional_information: Limited Telepathy to communicate simple ideas within 10 feet.
Advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Can share its Magic Resistance trait with its master when close.
test_queries: flying creature that can stun enemies
